entries.description: Support Globals configuration in SAM template for serverless functions.
Enable searching for `requirements.txt` when determining if a python method is a handler to match SAM build
Support building only the requested function when sam cli version is newer than 0.16
Upgraded AWS Java SDK to pull in latest model changes (#1099)
Fix DynamoDB template for Python does not create correctly.
Fix DaemonCodeAnalyzer restart not happening in a read action (#1012)
Fix the bug when project is in different drive than the temp folder drive for Windows. #950
Fix invalid credentials file reporting an IDE error
Fix issue where modifying a cloned run config results in mutation of the original
Fix runtime exceptions on project startup and run configuration validation
Fix read/write action issues when invoking a Lambda using SAM (#1081)
Make sure all STS assume role calls are not on the UI thread (#1024)
